item.title: Next Generation [Multiple worlds, Full bounty hunter with scoreboard, Oldschool]
item.dc:creator: @loved loved
item.description:
@loved wrote:

;D[quote=“Fridder, post:16, topic:478682”][quote author=loved link=topic=596902.msg4228391#msg4228391 date=1361124369]

Looks kind of good. I would maybe play thi----

Ew never mind lol… That looks terrible.

I don’t think I’d want to play this anyway…:

owner is banning people without warning

I only temporary banned him because he exploiting a bug ( i admit it was my fault the bug was there) i fully explained everything that was happening, it gave me time to investigate his account fully.

Also just because of the fight pits you’re judging my server? I didn’t even write the fight pits it came with my base and they have been since removed pending a revamp.

Don’t judge a server by 1 single picture.
[/quote]

I’m not going to defend my opinion. I’m talking about the maps, objects, and walls; not the minigame itself.

Other than that, your server does look good as I said previously.[/quote]Ok i miss-understood, thank you for the feedback.

Read full topic
item.source: Next Generation [Multiple worlds, Full bounty hunter with scoreboard, Oldschool]

item.title: Next Generation [Multiple worlds, Full bounty hunter with scoreboard, Oldschool]
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

[quote=“loved, post:15, topic:478682”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=596902.msg4228260#msg4228260 date=1361119358]
Looks kind of good. I would maybe play thi----

Ew never mind lol… That looks terrible.

I don’t think I’d want to play this anyway…:

owner is banning people without warning

[/quote]
I only temporary banned him because he exploiting a bug ( i admit it was my fault the bug was there) i fully explained everything that was happening, it gave me time to investigate his account fully.

Also just because of the fight pits you’re judging my server? I didn’t even write the fight pits it came with my base and they have been since removed pending a revamp.

Don’t judge a server by 1 single picture.[/quote]

I’m not going to defend my opinion. I’m talking about the maps, objects, and walls; not the minigame itself.

Other than that, your server does look good as I said previously.

Read full topic

Ew never mind lol… That looks terrible.

I don’t think I’d want to play this anyway…:

[quote author=CoderOops link=topic=596902.msg4226218#msg4226218 date=1361021356]
owner is banning people without warning
[/quote][/quote]
I only temporary banned him because he exploiting a bug ( i admit it was my fault the bug was there) i fully explained everything that was happening, it gave me time to investigate his account fully.

Also just because of the fight pits you’re judging my server? I didn’t even write the fight pits it came with my base and they have been since removed pending a revamp.

Don’t judge a server by 1 single picture.
